item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ukraine strikes Russia with US-made long-range missiles for first time
2. [Opinion] Trump’s demolition of the US state
3. Germany and Finland ‘deeply concerned’ about severed undersea cable
4. Severing of Baltic Sea cables likely to be sabotage, Germany says
5. Lutnick and Bessent’s battle for Treasury secretary turns bitter as Trump expands field
